mapper.select: select s.dn_chn standard_name,n.dn_id,n.dn_chn,n.dn_eng,n.stad_dn_id,n.term_type,n.syno_type,n.org_dn_chn, n.org_dn_eng,n.is_disable,n.description,n.update_man,n.update_time,n.operation from on_diag_name n left join on_diag_name s on s.dn_id =n.STAD_DN_ID where n.dn_id=#{ON_NAME_ID}

select s.ON_CHN standard_name,n.on_id,n.on_chn,n.on_eng,n.stad_on_id,n.syno_type,n.org_op_chn, n.org_op_eng,n.is_disable,n.description,n.update_man,n.update_time,n.version from on_operation_name n left join on_operation_name s on s.on_id =n.STAD_ON_ID where n.on_id=#{ON_NAME_ID}

select s.DEP_NAME standard_name,n.ID,n.DEP_NAME,n.STAD_ID,n.SYNO_TYPE,n.IS_DISABLE,n.DESCRIPTION,n.UPDATE_MAN,n.UPDATE_TIME,n.version from on_dep_name n left join on_dep_name s on s.ID =n.STAD_ID where n.ID=#{ON_NAME_ID}
mapper.update: UPDATE ON_PACK_SPEC SET STAD_PS_UNIT_CHN=#{STAD_PS_UNIT_CHN},STAD_PS_UNIT_ENG=#{STAD_PS_UNIT_ENG} WHERE PSU_ID=#{FK_PSU_ID}
UPDATE ON_PACK_SPEC SET STAD_PS_UNIT_CHN=#{STAD_PACK_SPEC_UNIT_CHN},STAD_PS_UNIT_ENG=#{STAD_PACK_SPEC_UNIT_ENG} WHERE PSU_ID=#{PSU_ID}
mapper.insert: insert into on_drug_form (F_ID, F_CHN_NAME, F_ENG_NAME, STAD_DOS_ID, STAD_DOS_CHN, STAD_DOS_ENG, ORG_DOS_CHN, ORG_DOS_ENG, ORG_STAD_DOS_CHN, ORG_STAD_DOS_ENG, REMARK, IS_DISABLE, UPDATE_MAN, UPDATE_TIME, DESCRIPTION, VERSION)values(#{DN_ID},#{DN_CHN},#{DN_ENG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{STAD_DN_ID},#{STAD_CHN},#{STAD_ENG,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORG_DN_CHN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ORG_DN_ENG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ORG_STAD_CHN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ORG_STAD_ENG,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{DRUG_MEMO,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{IS_DISABLE},#{UPDATE_MAN},#{UPDATE_TIME}, #{DESCRIPTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{VSERSION,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select:
select DN_ID from on_diag_name where DN_CHN = #{DN_CHN}
and DN_ID != #{DN_ID}

select DN_ID FROM ON_DRUG_NAME WHERE CHN_NAME=#{DN_CHN}
and DN_ID != #{DN_ID}

SELECT fac_id FROM ON_DRUG_FACTORY WHERE FAC_CHN=#{DN_CHN}
and FAC_ID != #{DN_ID}

select DP_ID from on_drug_pack WHERE DP_CHN=#{DN_CHN}
and DP_ID != #{DN_ID}

select SP_ID from on_drug_spec WHERE DRUG_SP=#{DN_CHN}
and SP_ID != #{DN_ID}

SELECT PS_ID FROM ON_PACK_SPEC WHERE PS_CHN=#{DN_CHN}
and PS_ID != #{DN_ID}

SELECT PSU_ID FROM ON_PACK_SPEC_UNIT WHERE PSU_CHN=#{DN_CHN}
and PSU_ID != #{DN_ID}

SELECT DR_ID FROM ON_DRUG_ROUTE WHERE DR_CHN=#{DN_CHN}
and DR_ID != #{DN_ID}

SELECT F_ID FROM ON_DRUG_FORM WHERE F_CHN_NAME=#{DN_CHN}
and F_ID != #{DN_ID}
SELECT DN_ID from on_diag_name where dn_chn=#{DN_CHN}
select on_id as DN_ID from on_operation_name where on_chn=#{DN_CHN}
select id as DN_ID from on_dep_name where dep_name=#{DN_CHN}
